nosimplefavoritelist: You have no items in your favorites.
simplefavoritelistanontext: Please $1 to view or edit items in your favorites.
simplefavoritenologintext: You must be [[Special:UserLogin|logged in]] to modify your favorites.
addedsimplefavoritetext: The page [[:$1]] has been added to [[Special:SimpleFavoritelist|your favorites]].
removedsimplefavoritetext: The page [[:$1]] has been removed from [[Special:SimpleFavoritelist|your favorites]].
simplefavoriteerrortext: An error occurred while changing your favorite list settings for $1.
tooltip-pt-simplefavoritelist: The list of pages you are monitoring for changes
tooltip-ca-simplefavorite: Add this page to your favorites
tooltip-ca-unsimplefavorite: Remove this page from your favorites
tooltip-simplefavorite: Add this page to your favorites
simplefavoritelistedit-normal-explain:
Titles in your favorites are shown below.
To remove a title, check the box next to it, and click {{int:Favoritelistedit-normal-submit}}.
You can also [[Special:SimpleFavoritelist/raw|edit the raw list]].
simplefavoritelistedit-normal-done: {{PLURAL:$1|1 title was|$1 titles were}} removed from your favorites:
simplefavoritelistedit-raw-explain:
Titles in your favorites are shown below, and can be edited by adding to and removing from the list; one title per line.
When finished, click {{int:Favoritelistedit-raw-submit}}.
You can also [[Special:SimpleFavoritelist/edit|use the standard editor]].
apihelp-simplefavorite-description: Add or remove a page from/to the current user's favorite list
apihelp-simplefavorite-summary: Add or remove a page from/to the current user's favorite list
apihelp-simplefavorite-param-unfavorite: If set the page will be unfavorited rather than favorited
